name: Remotely
description: Remotely is platform that helps you find full-time and part-time remote jobs. They have tech and as well as non-tech jobs.

name: Wellfound
description: Wellfound is a platform for startup founders to hire potential talents and for potential talents to find their ideal startup.

name: LinkdedIn
description: LinkedIn is one of the most popular platforms for job haunting. It can provide you all kinds of Tech-Jobs with ease.

name: Indeed
description: Indeed is another popular platform for job search. It provides you a couple of different options to land your dream job.

name: read.cv
description: It's a plaform that helps you get the job of your need

name: Glassdoor
description: Glassdoor is platform for job search. It provides you a couple of ways to get the search done

name: Dice
description: Dice is the leading career destination for tech experts at every stage of their careers.

name: Monstor
description: This site lets you explore among the millions of jobs in different companies.

name: Naukri
description: It's a platform that helps you find and get the job.

name: Freshersworld
description: It is the best platform to get the job and preparation for job interview.
